EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-04-25-RD-Sponsored-Tampa.Marketing Invite 3.Invite 3
EmailTemplate.subject: See you in Tampa?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-tampa-bay-registration-44702976807]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an executive networking event on Apr. 25th at Eddie V's Prime Seafood for an expertly prepared meal and specialty cocktails. Throughout our evening we will discuss challenges and develop strategies in hybrid landscapes. This event will be an opportunity to network with your peers and learn more about leveraging workload automation to drive digital transformation. Will we see you there?
Tampa Bay IT Networking Dinner
Eddie V's Prime Seafood 4400 West Bay Scout Boulevard, Tampa, Gl 33607 Wed. April 25, 2018 - 5:30 PM <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-tampa-bay-registration-44702976807]]>
Limited seats remain, please reserve yours here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-tampa-bay-registration-44702976807]]>!
Regards, The Turbonomic Team
